mapper.update: update t_food_menuweek set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODMENUID = #{foodmenuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEEKCODE = #{weekcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEEKNAME = #{weekname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODMENUID, WEEKCODE, WEEKNAME from t_food_menuweek where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODMENUID, WEEKCODE, WEEKNAME from t_food_menuweek
